title: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Mykolayivka, Vasukivka, Bohdanivka, Ivanivske, New York of Donetsk region. Russian ...
content: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Mykolayivka, Vasukivka, Bohdanivka, Ivanivske, New York of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Kostyantynivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
